{"code":"# MAX_COUNT will be injected (set externally)

from playwright.sync_api import sync_playwright

RESULT = []

with sync_playwright() as p:
    browser = p.chromium.launch()
    page = browser.new_page()
    page.goto('https://meb.gov.tr/meb_duyuruindex.php')

    # Select announcement rows in the table
    rows = page.locator('table tr').nth(1).locator('xpath=..').locator('tr').all()

    for i, row in enumerate(rows):
        if i == 0:
            # Skip header row
            continue
        if i > MAX_COUNT:
            break

        date = row.locator('td').nth(0).inner_text().strip()
        title_element = row.locator('td').nth(1).locator('a')
        title = title_element.inner_text().strip()
        link = title_element.get_attribute('href')

        # Construct full link if needed
        if link and not link.startswith('http'):
            link = page.url.rsplit('/', 1)[0] + '/' + link

        RESULT.append({
            'date': date,
            'title': title,
            'link': link
        })

    browser.close()

# RESULT will be returned automatically

{"code":"from playwright.sync_api import sync_playwright

MAX_COUNT = 5
RESULT = []

with sync_playwright() as p:
    browser = p.chromium.launch(headless=True)
    page = browser.new_page()
    page.goto('https://meb.gov.tr/meb_duyuruindex.php')

    # Wait for the table to be visible
    page.locator('table').wait_for()

    # Select rows from tbody, skipping the header
    rows = page.locator('table tbody tr').all()

    for i, row in enumerate(rows):
        if i >= MAX_COUNT:
            break

        date = row.locator('td').nth(0).inner_text().strip()
        title_element = row.locator('td').nth(1).locator('a')
        # Check if the anchor exists
        if not title_element.count():
            continue
        title = title_element.inner_text().strip()
        link = title_element.get_attribute('href')

        # Construct full link if relative
        if link and not link.startswith('http'):
            link = page.url.rsplit('/', 1)[0] + '/' + link
